entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times mixed with snow near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
